instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL DEPENDENCIES FIRST: yarn add framer-motion recharts @phosphor-icons/react clsx tailwind-merge
UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the colors from design_system.colors.palette to tailwind.config.js. Add the font families.
IMPORT FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
LAYOUT STRATEGY: Use a persistent SidebarLayout component. The main content area should have a max-width and be centered for large screens, but full width for dashboard.
THEME: Force DARK MODE by default. Add 'dark' class to the html or body tag initially.
INTERACTIVITY: All cards in the dashboard should have a hover state (subtle border color change or lift).
CHARTS: Use Recharts for the 'Live Metrics'. Style them to match the dark theme (no white backgrounds).
AI CHATBOT: Implement as a floating action button (FAB) bottom-right that expands into a glassmorphism panel.
NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications. Style them to be dark and minimal.
KANBAN: Make it visually distinct. Columns should have a subtle background (zinc-900/50). Cards should be draggable.
DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids.
Use 'Chivo' font for all headings to give a technical/industrial feel.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
Use Phosphor Icons (Duotone) for a premium look.
Make sure the app feels 'fast' - use optimistic UI updates where possible.
